Package no.hiof.webframework.application

Class Chatroom

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.application.tools.ImageUtility
no.hiof.webframework.application.Chatroom
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestableChatroom
public class Chatroom extends ImageUtility
The Chatroom class represent a chatroom in a web application. It extends the ImageUtility class, which provides utility methods for handling image files. The Chatroom class provides methods for setting chatroom properties such as chat method, message timestamp, delete message option, and chatroom title. It also provides methods for adding an icon image to the chatroom and overriding existing icon images. The Chatroom class is implemented as a Singleton, so only one instance of the class can exist at a time.

    • overrideExistingIconImage

      public static void overrideExistingIconImage(String absoluteImagePath, ImageType overrideImage)
      Overrides an existing icon image by copying the specified image file to the appropriate directory based on the given image type.
      Parameters:
      absoluteImagePath - The absolute image file path of the image to be copied-
      overrideImage - The enum type of image to be overridden (e.g. DEFAULT_1, DEFAULT_2).

    • addMessageTimeStamp

      public static void addMessageTimeStamp(boolean decision)
      Adds timestamps to the messages sent in the chatroom application.
      Parameters:
      decision - A boolean value (e.g. true or false).

    • addDeleteMessagesButton

      public static void addDeleteMessagesButton()
      Adds a delete button to sent messages in the chatroom application. The delete button is marked as a 'x' icon on the messages.

    • setTitle

      public static void setTitle(String chatRoomTitle)
      Sets the title of the chatroom application. The rooms have titles by default, so this can be used to add a custom title.
      Parameters:
      chatRoomTitle - The title represented as a String value.
